items.name: Open or hide the control bar:
items.des: A single finger draws a counterclockwise arc (half smile) on the screen to open or hide the control bar.

items.name: Moving the mouse:
items.des: A single finger swipes across the screen to move the mouse.

items.name: Left click:
items.des: A single-finger tap screen indicates a left mouse click.

items.name: Drag operation:
items.des: Press and hold the screen with a single finger, and drag it when the mouse is pressed. When the single finger is raised, the mouse appears and the drag is completed.

items.name: Context menu / right mouse button:
items.des: Double-finger click to simulate the right mouse button press.

items.name: Right mouse button press/drag:
items.des: Press the screen with two fingers and press the button with the right mouse button. Two fingers leave the screen and the right mouse button is raised.

items.name: Mouse wheel/middle button scrolling:
items.des: Two fingers simultaneously up/down, simulating mouse wheel.

items.name: Mouse wheel press/drag:
items.des: Three fingers long press the screen, the middle mouse button appears, press the prompt and drag. Three fingers leave the screen and the middle mouse button lifts up.
